name: Beta Model Kitty Fazcat Nose Clicker: REMAKE
name_original: Beta Model Kitty Fazcat Nose Clicker: REMAKE
description:
Small Easter game I made in like an hour or two, it really isn't much, but I had to rush it out. Enjoy it regardless

Instructions:

F11 for fullscreen

V for VSync

As for in-game instructions, click on eggs when they spawn, if Ernesto spawns, click on him to stun him, the max stun time is 3 seconds, don't let him touch the basket for too long! Get to 500 points before the timer runs out!
